dl.dd: Add a progress listener to the browser which will monitor loaded documents in all tabs in the tabbed browser. The progress listener should be based on the interface("nsIWebProgressListener") interface with an additional "browser" argument as the first argument of every method, which is the XULElem("browser") (not <tabbrowser> =Â gBrowser) where the event occurred. See Listening to events on all tabs for details.
